about:
Hey there! How's a goin? I'm Phil. Just to set the record straight, my real name is NOT Phil. I got the name from a movie script I wrote a while back, Philbert Rowanson. I also had a YouTube channel going on for awhile, but I stopped posting videos. My real identity is Matt McKinley, age 14, born and raised in Reno, Nevada, U.S.A. I'm currently in 9th grade and for the most part, I keep my grades up. I play the double bass and take all honors classes and I've gotten only one B in citizenship throughout my whole schooling carreer (stupid Spanish class). Anyways, I've played on Avicus since it got changed from MCZone, and I'd played on MCZone for as long as I can remember how to punch trees. I am currently awaiting my application for either approval or denial, so right now I'm just an average Joe who wants to get in some good Minecraftin'.

See ya later!
